content.html: As a father to daughters, I cannot imagine a world in which they’re denied an education. The women of Afghanistan have so much to offer. Denying them access to university is a grave step backwards. The world is watching. We will judge the Taliban by their actions.
content.value:
As a father to daughters, I cannot imagine a world in which they’re denied an education.
 
The women of Afghanistan have so much to offer. Denying them access to university is a grave step backwards. 

The world is watching. We will judge the Taliban by their actions.

content.html:
As a human, I can’t imagine a world where women are denied education! Do better Rishi! You don’t need to be a parent to hold this view. “As a father…” does not add kudos to your opinion. Being a parent doesn’t enhance empathy. #childfree #childless #nonparents #Parents
twitter.com/rishisunak/sta…
content.value:
As a human, I can’t imagine a world where women are denied education! 

Do better Rishi! 

You don’t need to be a parent to hold this view. 

“As a father…” does not add kudos to your opinion. 

Being a parent doesn’t enhance empathy.

#childfree #childless #nonparents #Parents
